author: Msnbc
title: AG Barr considers action against states over virus restrictions
description: Trump has told governors they can call their own shots on the pandemic. Barr, however, is prepared to sue governors whose shots he doesn't like.
content: Attorney General Bill Barr caused a bit of a stir two weeks ago when he appeared on Fox News and criticized state efforts to address the pandemic as "draconian." The Republican lawyer went on to express support for unproven medicinal treatments and called for… [+2727 chars]
